page.title: 11FARMING IN THE AREA
page.content: {Durley Manor Farm}is an arable farm growing wheat,potatoes and oil seed rape on 354 acres. It is worked by non-resident staff from{Stubbington and 400 pigs are cared for in their shelters by two local workers. When the pig are of marketable size they are sold direct to buyers in Kent. {Tangier farm}has 130 acres of land on which they grow maize and silage. There are 200 cattle and about 10 chickens. Two full time workers and one part time worker help on the farm. The cattle are taken to market on Mondays. The 70 acres at{Trillington Farm}is used to grow silage which is cropped by the farmer and his one employee in the Autumn. This year for the first time he has 76 beef cattle which he will take to{Winchester Market}in November.
